experiences.name: UBS Global Coding Challenge
experiences.description: Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills and algorithm development techniques, practice ethical hacking through CTF challenges and token replay attacks, and develop HTTP servers using Python, Flask, and ngrok.

experiences.name: TEMG 4950M Corporate Consulting Project: Advanced Air Mobility for Arup Aviation
experiences.description: Perform stakeholder interviews to understand the client's requirements and deliverables, perform competitor analysis and financial projections, and work in a team to design a solution and go-to-market plan.

experiences.name: The Organizing Committee of the Dual Degree Program of Technology and Management of the HKUST
experiences.description: Plan and coordinate an orientation camp, developing project management and communication skills within a team.
